projectDetailPage.title: Open Data 2.0
projectDetailPage.description: The 'Open Data 2.0' project aims to enhance transparency in public governance and the availability of information for the citizens of Kazakhstan. Our goal is to create a unified platform that aggregates government data in machine-readable formats, ensuring more convenient access to information for businesses, researchers, and citizens. The platform will contain various types of data, such as statistics, budgets, tender results, reports on government agencies' activities, as well as data on the social, economic, and environmental situation in the country.
list: Development of open data publication standards
Creation of a unified open data portal
Training of civil servants in working with open data
Development of a community of developers and analysts
projectDetailPage.moreDescription: We are confident that the project will contribute to improving the transparency and accountability of government structures, as well as help make citizen-government interaction more effective and transparent. The implementation of 'Open Data 2.0' will be an important step in the development of digital government in Kazakhstan, providing citizens with the necessary tools to participate in public life and make informed decisions.

similarProjects.title: E-Gov 2.0
similarProjects.description: Modernization of the electronic government portal
